import time
arr=[0]*(100000+6)
sp=[2]*(100000+6)
sp[1]=1
sp[0]=0
def generateSP(n):
    for i in range(3,n+1,2):
        #print(i)
        #print(arr[i])
        if arr[i]==0:
            arr[i]=1
            #print("y"+str(i))
            sp[i]=i
            j=i
            while j*i<=n:
                if arr[j*i]==0:
                    arr[j*i]=1
                    sp[j*i]=i
                j+=2                
def phi(n):
    u=[]
    ans=n
    while n>1:
        if sp[n] not in u:
            u.append(sp[n])
            ans=ans-(ans/sp[n])
        n=n/sp[n]
    return ans

etd=[0]*100005
t=time.time()
generateSP(100005)
for i in range(1,100005):
    etd[i]=phi(i)
#print(time.time()-t)
#print(etd[:25])



mod=1000000007
f=[0,1,1,2]
for i in range(100003):
    f.append((f[-1]+f[-2])%mod)

t=int(raw_input())
while t>0:
    n=int(raw_input())
    n+=1
    r=0
    for i in range(1,int(pow(n,0.5))+1):
        if n%i==0:
            r=(r+(f[i]*etd[n/i]))%mod
            if i!=n/i:
                r=(r+(f[n/i]*etd[i]))%mod     
    r=(r-1)%mod
    print(r)
    t-=1
